adjectives.description: improving (comparative more improving, superlative most improving)

entries.meaning: That tends to improve someone or something (especially (dated) to educate or morally better a person).
examples: […]  that Diviner part of Man, the Soule, which alone is capable of wearing the Glorious Image of its Author, being endowed with two chief Faculties, the Understanding and the Will; the former is blest and perfectionated by Knowledg, and the latter’s Loveliest and most improving property is Goodnesse.
